duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide manufacturing engineering services to support efficient manufacturing processes.
Develop and support a wide variety of processing applications such as machining, finishing, forging, casting, cleaning, heat treating, bonding, molding, etc.
Conduct feasibility study on advanced processes to estimate product cost and analyze capital equipment, capacity, and capability requirements.
Establish and improve process methods which meet performance and quality requirements.
Develop, lead, and execute project plans and schedules for work activities.
Evaluate multiple options to select the most appropriate processes and machining methods.
Lead equipment qualification or process validation projects.
Develop rationale to set new process performance and quality standards.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering with a minimum of 5-7 years of manufacturing engineering experience.
Knowledge in Lean Principles and/or Six Sigma or other problem-solving methodology is preferred.
Knowledge on how to conduct investigations and root cause analysis is preferred.
